page.title: 19MORE CLUBS IN HENFIELD.
page.content: Gym Club by Cassie. Gym Club is held on all different nights. It is held at the Village Hall. Everyone goes at different times to suit their age and ability. At Gym we work for different badges 4,3,2,1 and 0. 4 is the easiest and 0 the hardest. I have got my 4,3,2,1. We also do floor work, beam work, bar work and box work. My favourite is box work. Now there is a Boys' Gym Club. Second Henfield Brownies by Amy. Every Friday evening I go to Brownies at the Guide Hut. We play games and work for badges. In the Summer holidays I went on Pack Camp. Our theme was Carebears. It was great. At Christmas our Brownies are doing a play. I am the vet.fire We play ladders and firemen.I am working for my Highway badge which is hard.
